templates.content: We do offer photo books where you can insert a photo of your child's face. You can take a look at our Photo Personalized Books at the following link: https://iseeme.attn.tv/a8_hzf5hfcQl
templates.name: Do you offer books where I can insert a photo of the child's face?

templates.content: Yes, you can "preview" the pages of each book after you enter the personalized information by selecting the arrows next to the product image.
templates.name: Can I see what the book will look like before ordering?

templates.content: The gift message will be printed on the packing slip, which is sent in the package with the book to the recipient. This message should be no longer than 175 characters. The message will be "word wrapped" by the computer so do not type the "enter" key to separate lines. When the enter key is pressed, your message will include a "/" character. Thus, please type a message such as: "Dear Mike, I hope you will always treasure this book and think of Uncle John and me when you read it. Love, Aunt Mary".
templates.name: Where and how is the gift message printed?

templates.content: There is a maximum of 15 characters and spaces allowed for the child's first name. Another 15 characters and spaces are allowed for the middle name, and another 15 characters and spaces are allowed for the last name.
templates.name: What if the child's name has more letters than the maximum allowed in the book?

templates.content: Yes, we can make a book that includes the child's first and middle names, instead of first and last names. This does not compromise the book in any way; the book will be excellent. To use a middle name and not a last name, please enter the middle name in the middle name field and don't enter anything in the last name field. Please note that if you order a My Very Own book that spells out the child's name, you will be charged $4.99 extra to include the middle name, even if the last name is not included.
templates.name: Can I include the child's first and middle names instead of first and last names?

templates.content: The location and the time of the birthday party on the invitation are the same in every book and cannot be altered. Really sorry about that!
templates.name: Can I change the time and location on the Birthday Party Invitation in the My Very Happy Birthday book?

templates.content:
Yes, we may be able to accommodate this request if you send an email to customerservice@iseeme.com immediately after completing your order. Due to the custom printing and personalized nature of our products, we may not be able to accommodate changes after your order is placed.

Please note that our customer service representatives have to intercept your order to make this change before our software begins to process your order. Since our customer service representatives do not work on the weekends, we ask that you wait to place your order until a business day so that we can edit your order immediately after it is placed.
templates.name: Can I select certain fairies, animals, sea creatures, or countries to be used in the books?

templates.content: All of our books print the child's full name (or what is entered upon ordering) on the Dedication Page. Only the First Name field appears throughout the book in most cases. We recommend that you take a Virtual Tour of the book that you're interested in to see how the name is displayed throughout the book.
templates.name: Will my child's full name be printed throughout the book?

templates.content: No, the dollar amount spent will not be included with the package. Many of our customers have their gifts sent directly to the recipient. Invoice information is never included on the packing slip, only the items to be included with the order along with the printed "Gift Message," if one is entered.
templates.name: I am sending my gift directly to the child. Will an invoice or anything showing the amount spent be included with the gift?

templates.content: Our inventory includes 3-4 animals/fairies/sea creatures for every vowel and 2-3 animals/fairies/sea creatures for almost every consonant. The letters that have only one option are the Q, X & Z. The only time we would repeat an animal, fairy or sea creature is if the number of the same letter in the child's name exceeds the amount available. Please take a virtual tour to see all the available animals/fairies/sea creatures.
templates.name: Are the animals, fairies or sea creatures used in the My Very Own books ever repeated?

templates.content: Yes, our Pirate Book can be ordered both for boys and girls. Please take a virtual tour of the book. You will notice the "Pirate Child" is illustrated in such a way that it does not depict gender and all references to a girl or a boy are automatically changed to match the gender that is chosen when ordering.
templates.name: Can I have the "My Very Own Pirate Tale" made for a girl?

templates.content: Please type the child's name in the field called "Child's Middle Name". There is an extra $4.99 charge for the inclusion of the child's middle name in the My Very Own books because it makes the books longer. For those books, if you enter a name in the middle name field, $4.99 will automatically be added to your order at check-out.
templates.name: How do I include the child's middle name in the book?

templates.content: Yes, our books work wonderfully for adopted children. Maia and Allan Haag, creators of I See Me! Personalized Books are adoptive parents themselves, and they met with other adoptive parents to ensure that each would work for adopted children. The books talk about the day when the child "arrived", rather than was born. This enables you to decide whether you want to include the child's actual date of birth, or the date when the child arrived in the family. Many families provide the date when the child arrived into the family. Our "My Very Own" books can be used as an educational tool to explain to the child how he or she was named by the family.
templates.name: Are these books appropriate for adopted children?

templates.content: The inclusion of the child's middle name makes the books longer in the My Very Own books that spell out the child's name. Animals, fairies, or sea creatures bring letters to spell out the child's middle name, one letter, and one page at a time. The extra charge is to cover the extra paper and labor needed to add those personalized pages.
templates.name: Why is there an extra charge for middle name?

templates.content: Unfortunately, our software is set up to feature only one child and/or sibling's name in our books, with the exception of our Who Loves You? for Twins book and Hello World! Twins book. While all of our books will allow 15 characters/spaces per field, none of the other text is changed to reflect multiple children entered in the First Name field. Please take a Virtual Tour of the book that you'd like to order to make sure that the text will be acceptable to you.
templates.name: May I use two names in the First Name Field for Multiple Children and/or Siblings?

templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customerservice@iseeme.com. Our team is happy to help!
templates.name: Customer support

templates.content: We do have a printing facility in the UK.
templates.name: Do you have a printing facility in the UK?

templates.content: I'm afraid it's not possible to ship one order to multiple addresses. However, you may place your orders individually and email us at  customerservice@iseeme.com to ask if a shipping adjustment would be allowed. Happy to help if you have any further questions!
templates.name: Can you ship to multiple addresses?

templates.content: If your order has already gone through processing, no more changes can be made at this stage. Though I can definitely check with the team if it's still possible to catch it before it's processed! What's your order number, email address, and the changes you'd like to make?
templates.name: Cancel/edit

templates.content: If you choose standard shipping, your order will be delivered in approximately 6-8 business days after the order date ( 9-11 business days for Embroidered/Coffee Mug Gift Set ). For orders outside the Continental US it takes up to 5 weeks, for international orders up to 2 weeks and 2-3 weeks for Canada. We also offer expedited shipping options which you can find right here: https://iseeme.attn.tv/sl/J0OPSfNj
templates.name: Shipping time

templates.content: Yes, if you provide the child's nickname for the My Very Own books, the nickname will be used throughout the story and on the cover. The child's first name will be used on the dedication page.
templates.name: I want my child's formal name to appear on the Dedication Page, but use his nickname throughout the book. Is this possible?

templates.content: You may need to select "Browse Files" and upload a photo from directly from your computer.
